subject: subject
name: Name
title: Title
hotelApartmentStar: Hotel Apartment Except the Resorts, Club , Bars , Lounges - 40,020 AED
question: Question
requestLetterToServeAlcoholicBeverages: Request letter to serve alcoholic beverages from the Hotel / Restaurant Management.
noObjectionFromTheOwner: A letter of no objection from the owner of the establishment to serve alcoholic beverages in the Hotel / Restaurant.
monthlyConsumption: A letter from the Hotel / Restaurant management mentioning the value of the share required for the monthly consumption of alcoholic drinks with specifying the name of the person to be added to the facility is alcoholic beverages permit.
nationalIdentityForCommercialLicense: Passport copy + Residence visa copy in addition to the national identity for all the commercial license parties.
nationalIdentityOfThePerson: Passport copy Residence visa copy in addition to the national identity of the person to be added to the facility's alcoholic beverages permit (have to be under the sponsorship of the alcoholic beverages has to be served).
ownershipCertificate: Ownership certificate of the plot/premises issued by the Land Department Dubai.
classificationCertificate: Classification certificate issued from the Department of Tourism and Commerce Marketing regarding hotels, while for restaurants the classification certificate is issued form the Dubai Municipality Food Safety Department.
interiorAndExteriorPictures: Different pictures of the Hotel / Restaurant (interior and exterior) after the project is completed.
floorplan: The floorplan of the Hotel / Restaurant.
noObjectionLetter: A no objection letter from the Dubai Municipality Revenue Department (Al- Barsha Branch).
goodConductCertificate: A Good Conduct Certificate issued online through the Dubai Police Application for the person who is to be named on the liquor license of the Hotel/ Restaurant.
hotelNoObjectionLetter: A letter of no objection to serving alcoholic beverages from the property owner.
hotelOwnershipCertificate: A certificate of ownership of the real estate or land plan issued by the Dubai Land Department.
hotelEstablishmentContract: A copy of the establishment contract (the hotel).
hotelTouristLicense: A copy of the tourist license of the hotel establishment.
hotelClassificationCertificate: A hotel establishment classification certificate issued by the Department of Tourism and Commerce Marketing.
hotelPassports: Copies of passports and IDs of the parties to the tourist license.
hotelFacilityManagementLetter: A letter from the facility management requesting a permit for alcoholic beverages specifying the monthly quota with the name of the person responsible for alcohol.
hotelCriminalInvestigation: Certificate of criminal investigation of the person responsible for alcohol.
hotelPhotos: Various photos of the facility and its facilities.
restaurantNoObjectionLetter: A letter of no objection to serving alcoholic beverages from the property owner.
restaurantOwnershipCertificate: A certificate of ownership of the real estate or land plan issued by the Dubai Land Department.
restaurantEstablishmentContract: A copy of the restaurant's establishment contract.
restaurantCommercialLicense: A copy of the commercial license.
restaurantClassificationCertificate: The restaurant's food safety classification certificate issued by Dubai Municipality.
restaurantPassports: Copies of the passports and IDs of the commercial license parties.
restaurantFacilityManagementLetter: A letter from the restaurant administration requesting a permit for alcoholic beverages specifying the monthly quota with the name of the person responsible for alcohol.
restaurantCriminalInvestigation: Certificate of criminal investigation of the person responsible for alcohol.
restaurantPhotos: Various photos of the facility and its facilities.
hotelApartmentNoObjectionLetter: A letter of no objection to serving alcoholic beverages from the property owner.
hotelApartmentOwnershipCertificate: A certificate of ownership of the real estate or land plan issued by the Dubai Land Department.
hotelApartmentEstablishmentContract: A copy of the establishment contract for the hotel.
hotelApartmentTouristLicense: A copy of the tourist license of the hotel establishment.
hotelApartmentClassificationCertificate: A hotel establishment classification certificate issued by the Department of Tourism and Commerce Marketing.
hotelApartmentPassports: Copies of passports and IDs of the parties to the tourist license.
hotelApartmentFacilityManagementLetter: A letter from the facility management requesting a permit for alcoholic beverages specifying the monthly quota with the name of the person responsible for alcohol.
hotelApartmentCriminalInvestigation: Certificate of criminal investigation of the person responsible for alcohol.
hotelApartmentPhotos: Various photos of the facility and its facilities.
clubNoObjectionLetter: A letter of no objection to serving alcoholic beverages from the property owner.
clubOwnershipCertificate: A certificate of ownership of the real estate or land plan issued by the Dubai Land Department.
clubArticles: A copy of the club's articles of incorporation.
clubCommercialLicense: A copy of the commercial license.
clubRegistrationCertificate: A club registration certificate with the Emirates Federation.
clubPassports: Copies of the passports and IDs of the commercial license parties.
clubAdministration: A letter from the club’s administration requesting a permit for alcoholic beverages specifying the monthly quota with the name of the person responsible for alcohol.
clubCriminalInvestigation: Certificate of criminal investigation of the person responsible for alcohol.
clubPhotos: Various photos of the facility and its facilities.
reExportNoObjectionLetter: A letter from the Free Zone Authority with no objection to adding the activity of re-exporting alcoholic beverages.
reExportTradeLicense: A copy of the trade license issued by Trakhees.
reExportPassport: Copies of passports and IDs of the license parties.
reExportStorageStandards: A certificate of conformity to storage standards for food and beverages issued by Dubai Municipality.
reExportPermitCertificate: A letter from the company’s management requesting a specific permit containing the name of the person responsible for alcohol, whose name will be mentioned in the permit.
reExportCriminalInvestigation: A certificate of criminal investigation of the person responsible for permitting alcoholic beverages.
reExportOwnershipCertificate: A warehouse ownership certificate or warehouse lease contract.
reExportConformityCertificate: A certificate of conformity with the security and safety standards issued by the Civil Defense Department.
floatingCommercialLicense: A copy of the commercial license.
floatingPassport: A copy of the passports and hobbies of the license parties.
floatingLeaseContract: A lease contract (parking lot) for the floating restaurant.
floatingNoObjection: No objection to serving alcoholic drinks from the rental authority for the parking lot.
floatingOwnership: Ownership of the floating restaurant (the boat).
floatingManningCertificate: A safe manning certificate issued by the Dubai Maritime City Authority.
floatingVessel: Vessel data issued by the Dubai Maritime City Authority.
floatingClassificationCertificate: Restaurant classification certificate (food safety) issued by Dubai Municipality.
floatingPermitLetter: A letter issued by the company requesting a permit for alcoholic beverages specifying the monthly quota for alcohol and the name of the person responsible for alcohol, whose names will be mentioned in the permit.
floatingAlcoholicPermit: A copy of the passport and ID of the person responsible for permitting alcoholic beverages.
floatingCriminalInvestigation: A certificate of criminal investigation of the person in charge of a permit for alcoholic beverages.
floatingPhotos: Various photos of the floating restaurant.
shopsCommercialLicense: A copy of the commercial license.
shopsLeaseContract: A copy of the lease contract.
shopsSketchSite: Sketch of the site + photos of the site.
importExportNoObjectionCertificate: A letter from the Free Zone Authority with no objection to adding the activity of re-exporting alcoholic beverages.
importExportTradeLicense: A copy of the trade license issued by Trakhees.
importExportPassport: Copies of passports and IDs of the license parties.
importExportCertificateOfCriminal: A certificate of criminal investigation of the person responsible for permitting alcoholic beverages.
importExportManagementLetter: A letter from the company’s management requesting a specific permit containing the name of the person responsible for alcohol, whose name will be mentioned in the permit.
importExportCertificateOfFood: A certificate of conformity to storage standards for food and beverages issued by Dubai Municipality.
importExportConformityCertificate: A certificate of conformity with the security and safety standards issued by the Civil Defense Department.
importExportLeaseContract: A warehouse ownership certificate or warehouse lease contract.
campNoObjectionCertificate: A letter of no objection to serving alcoholic beverages from the property owner.
campOwnershipCertificate: A certificate of ownership of the real estate or land plan issued by the Dubai Land Department.
campEstablishmentContract: A copy of the camp establishment contract.
campCommercialLicense: A copy of the commercial license.
campClassificationCertificate: A camp food safety classification certificate issued by Dubai Municipality.
campPassport: Copies of the passports and IDs of the commercial license parties.
campPermitLetter: A copy of the desert camp permit issued by the Department of Tourism and Commerce Marketing in Dubai.
campAdministration: A letter from the camp administration requesting a permit for alcoholic beverages specifying the monthly quota and the name of the person responsible for alcohol.
campCriminalInvestigation: Certificate of criminal investigation of the person responsible for alcohol.
campPhotos: Various photos of the facility and its facilities.
